findings.title: CLI error envelope formatting
findings.description: Non-debug CLI errors should be single-line and actionable, while --debug should include verbose diagnostics and stack traces.

findings.title: Capability inventory discovery
findings.description: Agents need machine-readable capability discovery covering tools, constructions, and compositions via CLI and MCP.

findings.title: ResultQualityJudge
findings.description: Agentic evaluation needs relevance, completeness, actionability, and accuracy scoring with calibrated thresholds.
